entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 7:02 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:02 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
